title: War guilt clause in Treaty of Versailles

content.question:
"The Allied and Associated Governments affirm, and Germany accepts, the responsibility of Germany and her allies for causing all the loss and damage ... as a consequence of the war."

-Treaty of Versailles, 1919

Which of the following best states one purpose of the treaty clause above?

choices.label: To give the League of Nations the power to impose economic and military sanctions.
To provide a basis for international disarmament talks
To encourage independence for European colonies
To include Germany in the peace negotiations
To justify large reparations payments from Germany

content.answer: To justify large reparations payments from Germany
